content: Meet me at the church on West 23rd street. It will be southeast of your current location. On your way, you will see Shirley Goodman Resource Center, which is three blocks north and half a block west of the church. The church is in the middle of the block, if you reach a college you have gone too far.

I'm staying at a hotel at East 31st south of your current location. Its not the Hilton Garden Inn but it is not far from it, just 2-3 blocks south of it.  There is a Zipcar sharing just a block east of it.
Meet me at the post office at lower Manhattan, at the north west corner of the park where city hall is.
The garden is north of your location, close to the West street, near the bay. It is about 2 blocks north of Washington Market Park.
The resturant is north-east of you on East 27 street. It is 4 blocks north of the theater. You might pass Calvary Church on the way.

I'm just standing next to a wastebasket across from a pharmacy on west 75th.  There is a flea marketplace on the next block. You should mainly walk west, it is at the corner of the second block after the park.
The post box is just a block west-south from you. A block north of the theatre and south of the church.

Meet me at the resturant on East 50th. You would have to go down south for that. You will pass the LVMH Tower on your way. Its east of the Grand Central Terminal and its one block east from a W hotel.

Let's ride bikes from my current position on the corner of John street.  It's northeast of your current location. You will pass the Vietnam Veterans Plaza park. Continue north until you reach John street and then it will be on the corner to your left.
I just stoped to drink at drinking fountain near the far east end of East 46th street. Meet me here. Just go up north.  I'm not far from One Dag Hammarskjold Plaza.
I'm sitting at a bench near the corner of East 72nd.  Just walk up north. You might pass a Target on your way (about 2 blocks from where I'm).
I am at a frame shop on the corner of W. 19th St, in Chelsea. It's on the other side of the block as Trek bike shop. It's just 3-4 blocks south of the London Terrace.
I'm at a Mexican restaurant on Broom street north of you.  It's one block northwest of the art center. It is also one block east from the fire department.
I'm sitting on a bench in the southern part of Manhattan. It's west of newsagent shop. You should bypass the park from the east and walk on south street and then turn south.

I'm in a garden near the waterfront about 10 blocks south of the Roosevelt Island Tram. You should go north until to reach the garden. I'm north of some historical memorial and east of the post office.
I'm at a bar on the west side of Lafayette street. It's just two blocks north from the beginning of the street. Come here.

Meet me on W. 35th St. There is a Macy's west of me. I'm at the second restaurant on the block from the west part. I'm on the north side of the street. There is a university building on my east-south.
I'm parking my bike on E. 28th St, East-South of your current location. There is a Kalustyan's supermarket just a block west of me. You should pass the Mid-Manhattan Library on your way.
Come to the library. Walk past Spice resturant and then it will be on the end of the block east of you. The library will be near a parking lot and one block south of Chase bank.
Head past Ridgewood Savings Bank and continue until Pil Pil resturant at the corner. The supermarket is at the end of the block. It will be near Yorkville Library.

Meet at the resturant. Go past Rufus D. Smith Hall, which is part of the University, and continue to the next Starbucks. Continue north until West 31 and the go west. It will be near a night club, one block southeast of the Biergarten pub.
go north on park avenue until east 34th street then go west until you see the bicycle racks that is where we will meet
MEET ON DRINKING WATER, IT IS LEFT OF THE 5TH AVENUE STREET. IT WAS NEARBY THE HISTORIC MEMORIAL AND LEFT TO THE  BILLY JOHNSON PLAYGROUND.

From bicycle parking, head toward Citi Bike. Cross the street toward Herald Square and then head toward Dunkin Donuts but turn on the street before it. Head to the next intersection and TD Bank will be on the opposite corner of the intersection.

Come to the Italian restaurant on Hudson Street located west of you.  There is a parking lot and Upright Brew House one block to the south of the destination. If you see a drinking water, you have gone one block too far.

Meet me at the fast food restaurant on Centre Street. Keep going north on that street until reaching a historic building. The fast food is two blocks away at the start of the block. If you see a pharmacy, you have gone too far.

Let's meet up at the garden on Liberty Avenue on your northeast. Across the street and on the other end, there is a cafe . Two other gardens are located on the opposite block to its south near the railroad.
Head southwest to meet me at the cafe on 9th Avenue. There is a church on my east and Samsung is located on my west.

Meet me at Bank of America southeast of you. Come to 5th Avenue and continue heading south until you see Sidewalk Clock at 522 5th Avenue. Then go east to the next block.  Bank of America is at the beginning of that block.

Meet me at the cafe. Go east until you are right next to the water. You will see the United Nations Post Office. Right next to that is the cafe.

Let’s have tea at the tea shop. Head north about 15 blocks, give or take. You’ll see a bank on West 72nd Street. The tea shop is in that same block. Just go straight up from the bank and there it is. It’s between a restaurant and a coffee place.

Meet me at the fast food restaurant. Go north and slightly east until you reach the bank. From there you’ll want to go one block south and then one block west. The restaurant will be on 3rd Avenue, next to the restaurant in the northeast corner.

Meet me at the toilets! You’ll want to go all the way to your west until you can’t go any further. Then, walking along that last street, go south until you hit two gardens. The toilets are very close to it. Go south a tiny bit more and you’ll see a coffee shop. The toilets are right below that, next to a water fountain.

Meet me at the wastebasket. Head south about 14 blocks or so, then east until you hit the water’s edge and can go no further. To help you figure out where the exact location is, look for a bicycle rental and a parking lot in Murphy Park. From the bicycle rental, go straight east to the water. Go RIGHT to the edge of the water so you couldn’t get any closer if you tried. Then go ever so slightly north, so you are lined up with the end of Avenue C Loop, and northeast from the bicycle rental. The wastebasket is there.

Meet me at the restaurant. It’s not far from you at all. Go south two blocks and east about seven, and there it is. More specifically, look for the block with the ice cream place which is right next to the block with all the greenery. The restaurant is in that block, on Forsyth Street, about in the middle of the street.

Meet me at bicycle parking right near the university. You’ll want to go north for a while until you see University Village. The university will be on the west side of it, and bicycle parking is right across the street from it. The street is LaGuardia Place.

I want to get my hair done. Let’s meet at the hairdresser shop. From where you are, head north for a ways and then east. Look for a charging station and a church. Go northwest of the block that the church is in. The hairdresser shop is on the east side of this block, on 2nd Avenue, just below another hairdresser shop that is in the northeast corner. It is also just above two beauty shops.

Meet me at the Convenience Shop. Head north up the long street that you're on until you come to the intersection of West 25th Street. You'll see Fairway Market to your right. Cross the street from there. You will see 2 stores. It is the store closest to Chelsea Tower.
Meet me at the church. You’ll want to go southeast until you reach the music venue. The church is in the block just north of that, on West 4th Street. It is next to Lipton Dining Hall.

Meet me at bicycle parking on East 6th Street. Head southeast until you see Tompkins Square Park. You’ll see the Samuel Sullivan Cox historical monument on the southwest corner of the park. Go to the block just south of there, crossing one street. I will be on East 6th Street on the south side of that block. You will see two bicycle parking places with a restaurant in between them. I am at the bicycle parking on the right, farthest away from August Laura.

Meet me at the bench. From where you are, go straight south all the way down to Au Bon Pain. This will be just west of the Whitehall St South Ferry. The destination is in the block south of Pearl Street and south of the block with One Battery Park Plaza. You will see three places for bicycle parking. The bench is right there, right below them.

Please meet me at the hairdresser shop on 8th Avenue. Go north and slightly west until you reach 2 restaurants. The hairdresser is in the block directly north of there, in the northwest corner, next to Kiss My Slice.

Meet me at bicycle parking. Start heading south and slightly west until you pass True Value. From there, go south 4 blocks. From that block, go to the block just west of it. The location is in the upper corner where West 18th Street meets a major avenue.

Let’s meet at the clothes shop north of you. You will want to go straight north until you reach the atm. This is actually PAST our goal, so from here you will want to go south one block and then west one block. The shop is at the southeast corner of this block, at the very corner of East 46th Street and another intersecting street.
Meet me at the cafe on Mulberry Street. Go south and slightly west until you reach the attraction. The cafe is in that same block in the northwest corner. There are 4 restaurants surrounding it.

I need my bike fixed so let’s meet up at the bicycle shop. From where you are, head south about eight blocks or so. Look for a church and a bank relatively close to each other. The bicycle shop is located just north of the bank, both of which are on Clinton Street.

Meet me at the bar. Go northwest until you reach West 4th Street. There is a charging station south of the block you need to go to. Right to the west of it there is a cinema and a clinic. On the block with the bar, the bar is very near the northwest corner. There is a bicycle parking and Washington Square Dinner right next to it.
Meet me at the pharmacy. Go north until you reach Best Buy on West 62nd St. Go North until you get to a Bank of America. The pharmacy is across the street from the bank.

Meet me at the perfumery shop just south of you. Go south about three blocks and then go east two blocks. You should be on the block with the hotel in it.  The perfumery shop is right across from the hotel and is on West Broadway Street.

Meet me at the restaurant. Go northwest until you reach the MacDougal-Sullivan Gardens Historic District. From there, go north on MacDougal Street to the next block. The restaurant will be in the middle of the block, (on the east side of MacDougal Street), just right of Creperie.

Let's meet at Audi. Head north until you hit the MetLife building. Head north again about 2 blocks. Audi is in the corner of this block where East 47th Street meets another street. It is right next to bicycle parking.

I’m in the mood for some ice cream. Let’s meet at the ice cream shop on Amsterdam Avenue. You’ll need to head north for a while, passing The North Face and the historic memorial. From the historic memorial, go north about three blocks to a charging station. The ice cream shop is right across the street from the charging station, in the east direction.

Meet me at bicycle rental. You’ll want to go pretty much straight east. When you reach the library, go to the block north of it with St. Catherine’s Park. The goal is in the northeast corner of that block, on 1st Avenue.
Meet me at bicycle parking. Head straight west until you get to Trader Joe's.  Go south 3 blocks. The bicycle parking is on 4th Avenue just next to Grace Memorial House.

Let’s meet up at the bicycle parking. You’ll want to head south quite a bit, and then when you reach the Marriott, go one block west. There will be an ice cream shop and a church located in the same block. The bicycle parking is in the north of the block, on West 46th Street. It is right next to the French Quarters Guest Apartments.

Let’s meet at the butcher shop. Go south for a while until you reach the fire station on Great Jones Street. The butcher shop is on the block just south of that, in the northeast corner of the block, on Great Jones Street.

Meet me at the bank. Go straight south until you pass the library and CVS pharmacy. You will see the bank in the northeast corner of the block just south of the library, at the intersection of East 46th Street and a long major avenue.

Let’s meet at the restaurant.(Note: The goal marker description is incorrect as this is actually an Urgent Care). Go all the way up the long main road that is just to the left of you. Stop at the intersection of East 42nd Street. Go one block east on that street. Right at the beginning of the next block, at the corner is the “restaurant”. It is right across from Dunkin Fast food.

Meet me at bicycle parking. Go south about ten blocks, and then east about four. Look for Affina Hotels on East 64th Street. The bicycle parking is in the same block on the same street in the southeast corner of the block.

Let’s meet at the alcohol shop. Go northeast for a while until you see a church and then a cafe slightly north of it. The alcohol shop is in the block north of the church. It is in the southwest corner of the block, where Avenue A intersects with another street.
Meet me at the restaurant. Go straight south until you reach Aldo. Cross the street to the block east of that. The restaurant is going to be the one in the very southeast corner of that block.

Come see me at the drinking water on pier 25. It is the same pier with the historic ships and viewpoint. Pretty much just walk straight west from where you are until you reach the waterfront. You might need to go south just a bit but you should see the pier easily from there. The drinking water you want is the second one on the pier, next to the Sweet Love Snack Bar.

Meet me at Pier I right next to the bench. You’re going to want to go west for a while until you hit West Side Highway, right before the water. Go north a bit until you reach the cafe and toilets. The pier is just west of them. I’m about halfway down the pier on the same side as the bench.

Meet me at the restaurant. It’s not far from you at all. Just go south two blocks and west one block and there it is, on 8th Avenue, across the street from T-Mobile. It is just south of Houndstooth Pub.

Let’s meet for coffee at the cafe. It is super close to where you are now, so it shouldn’t be hard to find. Just go straight down through Madison Square and the cafe is on the south side of East 23rd Street, right below the south east corner of Madison Square Park. There is a bicycle repair station in the block beneath it.

Go south about six blocks and then west about three (approximate, not exact) and meet me at the bench. You’re going to want to look for a prison. West of that prison you’ll see St. Andrews Plaza. The bench is in that plaza, right across from St. Andrew Church which is on its east. It is also right across from City Store which is to its west.

Meet me at the restaurant for lunch. Start by going east and slightly north to East 2nd Street. You’ll see a pharmacy that’s right across the street from a cafe. Go to the block with the pharmacy. The restaurant is near the southeast corner of the block , on East 2nd Street, and is right next to an art shop.

Let’s meet at the museum. Head all the way south until you reach the water and can go no further without crossing a bridge. Go a bit west until you see Tackle Cart and the cinema. The museum is just left of the cinema, across the street.

I’m hungry. Meet me at the restaurant on Mott Street, my treat. To get there, go west about four blocks maybe? Then go north about three blocks. To make it easier, look for a fast food place, and Cricket Wireless. The restaurant is in the block right above Cricket Wireless. Again, it is on Mott Street , so when you get to this block, go all the way to the east side. The restaurant you want is between another restaurant that is in the northeast corner, and a cafe.

Head north and slightly east and meet me at the restaurant on 2nd Avenue. Look for the bank, which is in the block east of the restaurant, and right across the street from it. It is right next to Innocent Yesterday, in the upper east side of the block.

Meet me at the bench. You’ll want to go northwest of where you are, all the way out to the water. It’s going to be on Pier 1, right past the toilets and cafe to the west. When you get to the Pier, the bench is going to be about 4/5ths of the way down, on the north side.
Meet me at Max Mara. Go east for a while until you reach Dolce & Gabbana. Go to the block east of that and it is right in the southwest corner.

Meet me at the arts centre. Go west and slightly south , through Times Square until you see an atm and a bus station right across the street from one another. The block that the atm is in also has the arts centre in it. It’s on West 39th Street and is in the middle of the street, right next to a cupcake place.

Let’s meet at bicycle parking. Go west and slightly south until you see the bank. Then go west one block from there and the bicycle parking is on Sullivan Street , on the south side about a third of the way down (it’s the only one there).

Let’s meet at recycling. Go straight south for a while until you hit South William Street. The recycling place is at the southwest corner of that street and another street that is a long, main Street. If it helps, in the same block as the goal is a restaurant all the way to the east, and in the block south of the goal is Duolingo Headquarters.

Meet me at the bar. Head northwest until you reach Nordstrom, which is slightly south of Columbus Circle. You’ll want to go two blocks west of there, to the same block as Citibank and Pinkberry, among several other places. The bar that you want is on West 58th Street, diagonal from Duane Reade.

Meet me at the clinic on East 32nd Street. You’ll have to go south for quite a while, and slightly east. Look for a Mattress Firm. The clinic is in the block northeast of the Mattress Firm. It is in the southwest corner of the block, right across the intersecting streets from Mattress Firm.

What do you say we meet up at the electronics shop and get something for John’s birthday? You’re pretty close to it already. Just go south maybe 8 or so blocks. Look for Self Edge. The electronics shop is in that same block. It’s on Allen Street and is in the southwest corner of the block. It’s across from Askan.

Let’s meet at the fountain. Go north about 12 blocks or so, then head west until you see Lotte Hotels & Resorts. If you go north to the next block, the fountain is right across the street from there on East 51st Street. There is a coffee place in the northwest corner of the block.

Let’s meet at Flixbus. Go southeast until you see a bicycle rental on Allen Street. Flixbus is in that same block. It is actually straight down from bicycle parking, and in the middle of the block. You can’t miss it.

Meet me at the clothes shop. Go north for a while until you reach the Central Park Zoo. You will see a post box on the east side of the zoo. The clothes shop is in the block just north of there, on Madison Avenue. Buccellati and a jewelry shop are right next to it.

Let’s meet at the bench near Pier 66a. Walk west all the way to the waterfront. On pier 66a you’ll see a historic ship and a pub. But you’re not going on pier 66a. Instead, go south of it. You’ll see two bicycle parking spots right at its entrance. Keep going a bit south and you’ll see “three benches”. Your bench is north, between “three benches” and the south most bicycle parking. It’s about a quarter of the way north between those two spots.
Go north for a ways and meet me at the bicycle parking on 2nd Avenue. It is right next to TD Bank and in the same block as the attraction.

Let’s meet and have dinner at the restaurant. Head north until you get to Central Park Zoo and see a clock. From there you’ll want to go to the block on your northeast. The restaurant is on that block, located on the south side of East 66th Street, towards the northeast corner of the block, but not quite. There is a bike place right next to it.

Let’s meet at the bench in Wagner Park. Go south about six blocks, then head west all the way to the water’s edge. Look for Wagner Park. There is a bar just south of where we need to meet, and two museums just north of it. You’ll also see a restaurant. From this restaurant, walk west until you are at the very edge of the green. That is the bench we are meeting at.

Let’s meet at the vacant shop. Head straight north for a ways until you see a pharmacy. The vacant shop is in the block west of the pharmacy, on Columbus Avenue. It is almost in the northeast corner of the block.

Let’s meet at the restaurant. Go pretty much straight north until you reach a block that has both bicycle parking and a pharmacy in it. The restaurant is in this block. It is northwest of the pharmacy, right next to the wine shop.
Meet me at Anthropologie. Go southeast until you get to 5th Avenue. It is on the block just north of Free People. It is right across from there and in the southwest corner of the block.
Let’s meet at the toy shop so I can pick up a gift for my little brother. From where you are, go straight north until you hit

Meet me at the parking space. From where you are, go east until you are almost at the waterfront. You’ll see an area with a bunch of street “Loops”. You need to go to Avenue C Loop. It is south from 2 locations: Parking space, and five parking spaces. It’s on the west side of Avenue C Loop.

Meet me at the ticket shop. Go northeast to Chinatown. From there, go east one block. The ticket shop is in the southeast corner of this block, which also has the cafe in it. It is on Chrystie Street.

Let’s meet at bicycle parking. Go east for a while until you’re only a couple blocks away from the river. Then go south about ten blocks. You should see the fire station. You’ll want to go one block east of that, where there is also a CVS pharmacy. The bicycle parking is in that block, straight across from the park. It is on the south side of East 29th Street.

Meet me at the alcohol shop. Go southwest about 7 blocks, give or take. You’ll eventually see an atm on 3rd Avenue. Go right across that street and there is the alcohol shop. If it helps, it’s in the same block as the supermarket, which is at the far west end.

Let’s meet up at the garden. Head straight west, passing the Empire Building and 1 Wall Street. Go south one block from the Empire Building. You’ll see Trinity Place, which you will need to cross. At four benches, go northwest, staying in the same block. The garden will be in the northwest corner of that block, close to a short street.

Meet me at the jewelry shop northeast of you on 1st Avenue. It’s across the street from a Starbucks. It’s also in the same block as Trader Joe’s and fast food. It is on the south side of 1st Avenue right next to Veeray Dhaba.

Can we meet up at the bench and relax for a bit? From your current location, head straight north for quite a while until you are at the World Trade Center / 9-11 Memorials. You’re going to want to go to the middle of that block, just west of the National September 11 Memorial & Museum. Just south of that is a historic memorial on Liberty Street.
We're going to meet at the bar on West 37th Street across the street from the Asian restaurant & two clothing stores.
Meet me at the noodle bar across the street from the Butcher on 3rd Avenue, northeast of your current location. There should be a bike share on the opposite corner of the intersection as well.
